alert.note: Alert for Sweetwater (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 12:28PM MDT until May 26 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Sweetwater County in south central Wyoming... * Until 130 PM MDT. * At 1228 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles east of Lyman, or 16 miles south of Granger, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Little America. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 57 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Riverton. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
